Plot: A recently cheated on married woman falls for a younger man who has moved in next door, but their torrid affair soon takes a dangerous turn.
Title: The Boy Next Door
Actors: Jennifer Lopez, Ryan Guzman, Ian Nelson, John Corbett
tomatoConsensus: The Boy Next Door may get a few howls out of fans of stalker thrillers, but for most viewers, it won't even rise to "so bad it's good" status.
